org.sd.nlp
Interface LexicalTokenizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DelimitedStringLexicalTokenizer, StringWrapperLexicalTokenizer
public interface LexicalTokenizer

Tokenizes words from a sentence that have definitions according to a lexicon.

If no definitions are found, the "smallest" word is returned undefined.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 LexicalEntry getFirstEntry()
          Get the first lexical entry, from which all tokens are accessible.
 java.lang.String getInputString()
          Get the entire input string being tokenized.
